greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of the exponential generating function (1/2)*(1 + 4*x)*(1 - (1 + 4*x)^(-1/2))/x.
comment: This gives one half of the z-sequence entries for the generalized unsigned Lah number Sheffer matrix Lah[4,1] = A048854.
For Sheffer a- and z-sequences see a W. Lang link under A006232 with the references for the Riordan case, and also the present link for a proof.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..366
Wolfdieter Lang, Note on a- and z-sequences of Sheffer number triangles for certain generalized Lah numbers.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Sep 13 2017
